name: Core Qualities
description: A comprehensive collection of core qualities for all Digimon.

qualities.name: ACCELERATE
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 **Movement** for each **Rank** in this Quality.

The maximum **Ranks** that can take in **ACCELERATE** is equal to the Digimon’s **RAM**.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: PRODIGIOUS SKILL
qualities.description:
**Whenever you take this Quality, choose a specific Skill that corresponds with a Tamer’s list of Skills (such as Feats of Strength, Stealth, Awareness, etc)**.

The Digimon gains a +3 bonus to those Skill Checks.

The maximum Ranks a Digimon can take in this Quality is equal to its **Stage**.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: DATA OPT: CLOSE COMBAT
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to **ACC** when using a **[MELEE]** tagged Attack. This bonus increases to +3 if the **Target** is missing **Wound Boxes**. 

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: DATA OPT: RANGED STRIKER
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to its **ACC** when using a **[RANGE]** Tagged Attack. The Digimon gains +2 to its Range and Effective Limit.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: DATA OPT: WARDEN
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to **ARM**. The Digimon can take an **Interrupt Action** spending 1 less Action (potentially a **Free Action**) **Once per Combat**.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: DATA OPT: BRAWLER
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to all **Skill Checks** made to initiate or during **Clashes**. The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to **DAM** when Attacking a Digimon it’s Clashing with.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: DATA OPT: SPEEDSTER
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to its **Movement**. The Digimon ignores the first penalty to its **DOD** from being Attacked after its turn.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: DATA OPT: EFFECT WARRIOR
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 **Potency** to all Attack Effect Tags that use a Derived Stat from the Caster.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: DATA OPT: VARIABLE
qualities.description:
The Digimon can reroll a **Skill Check** or **Pool Check** it has made **ONCE PER ROUND** (which resets at the end of the Digimon’s turns) during Combat. It must take the new result.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: EXTRA MOVE: FLIGHT
qualities.description:
The Digimon suffers -1 **Movement**. The Digimon is capable of flying through the air. The Digimon loses this Extra Movement while it is at half its Maximum Wound Boxes or fewer.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: EXTRA MOVE: DIGGER
qualities.description:
The Digimon is capable of burrowing through the ground equal to its **Movement**, so long as it’s as soft as dirt. Snow or sand are other alternatives. While underground, it does not treat any creatures within half its **RANGE** as **OBSCURED**, as long as they are touching the same ground. It also does not treat any underground Digimon as **OBSCURED** if it is above ground.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: EXTRA MOVE: SWIMMER
qualities.description:
The Digimon’s **SWIMMING Movement** now uses the Digimon’s full **Movement**. It does not treat any Digimon as **OBSCURED** due to the surface of water, regardless of whether the Digimon itself is underwater or not.
It can now Hold its Breath an unlimited amount of times per Combat.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: EXTRA MOVE: WALLCLIMBER
qualities.description:
The Digimon is capable of scaling vertical surfaces equal to its **Movement**, but not on ceilings.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: EXTRA MOVE: JUMPER
qualities.description:
The Digimon’s Jump height and length now uses the Digimon’s full **Movement**.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: FIRE
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of any [BURN] on it by 1. The Digimon ignores the penalties of extreme heat. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: WATER
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of [FRATL] on it by 1. The Digimon can breathe underwater. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: WIND
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon halves the Potency of [PULL] affecting it (when it’s used as a Negative effect). The Digimon reduces any Crash Damage it takes by 1. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: EARTH
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon halves the Potency of [PUSH] affecting it (when it’s used as a Negative effect). The Digimon reduces any Damage it takes from environmental factors (such as falling debris or sharp terrain) by 1. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: ICE
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of any [FREEZE] on it by 1. The Digimon ignores the penalties of extreme cold. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: WOOD
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of any [POISON] on it by 1. The Digimon can focus on non-artificial land and learn one fact on a subject related to the surrounding area once per day. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: STEEL
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of any [HEAVY] on it by 1. The Digimon can understand the purpose of any artificial object it can touch once per day. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: THUNDER
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of any [DULL] on it by 1. The Digimon can power or recharge an electronic device once per day. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: DARKNESS
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of any [DOOM] on it by 1. The Digimon can see through dark or dimly-lit areas unimpeded. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: NATUREWALK: LIGHT
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains +1 to a Stat of its choice except Health. The Digimon reduces the Duration of any [DISTRACT] on it by 1. The Digimon can create a light source on its body that provides light in a number of spaces equal to its Stage around it. The Digimon does not suffer Movement penalties from Difficult Terrain of its chosen environment and is resistant to Elemental Force Attacks of the same Tag.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: INSTINCT
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **WEAPON**
Your Digimon possesses a driving force behind its movements, derived from the energy of its own being. The Digimon gains a bonus to **DOD**, **HP** and **Movement** equal to the **Ranks** in this Quality.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**

qualities.name: WEAPON
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **INSTINCT**
Your Digimon has a Weapon, or some type of fighting style it prefers. Attacks which use said Weapon or fighting style may gain a **[WEAPON]** Tag. 

A Digimon may only have a number of **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks equal to the ranks it has in this Quality. Whenever a Digimon uses a [WEAPON] Tagged Attack, it gains a bonus to **ACC** and **DAM** equal to the **Ranks** in this Quality.

**THIS FEATURE IS INCLUDED IN THE CORE DISCOUNT QUALITIES**
